content:
llvm has a discord channel now, which might be interesting for rustc folks as well: https://twitter.com/chandlerc1024/status/1196339929644584960

Trying to modernize #LLVM's communication tech w/ Discord and Discourse: https://discord.gg/xS7Z362 https://llvm.discourse.group/ Details here: http://lists.llvm.org/pipermail/llvm-dev/2019-November/136880.html

- Chandler Carruth (@chandlerc1024)
